about: A Dublin Core metadata schema for datasets aligned with DCAT AP 2.1

dataset_fields.label: Title
dataset_fields.help_text: A name given to the resource.

dataset_fields.label: Description
dataset_fields.help_text: An account of the resource. May include an abstract, table of contents, or free-text account.

dataset_fields.label: Digital Object Identier
dataset_fields.help_text: Digital Object Identifier for the dataset

dataset_fields.label: Data Standard
dataset_fields.help_text: The metadata standard or schema used for this dataset

dataset_fields.label: Provenance
dataset_fields.help_text: Detailed information about the origin and processing history of the dataset

dataset_fields.label: Quality Indicator
dataset_fields.help_text: Indicator of the dataset's quality or reliability

dataset_fields.label: Preservation Statement
dataset_fields.help_text: Information about long-term preservation plans for this dataset

dataset_fields.label: Keywords
dataset_fields.help_text: The topic of the resource. Typically represented using keywords, key phrases, or classification codes.

dataset_fields.label: Creator
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: The entity primarily responsible for making the resource
dataset_fields.help_text: An entity primarily responsible for making the resource. Examples: a person, organization, or service.

dataset_fields.label: Contributor
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: An entity responsible for making contributions to the resource
dataset_fields.help_text: An entity responsible for making contributions to the resource. Examples: a person, organization, or service.

dataset_fields.label: Organization
dataset_fields.help_text: An entity responsible for making the resource available. Examples: a person, organization, or service.

dataset_fields.label: Publisher Name
dataset_fields.help_text: The name of the entity responsible for making the resource available.

dataset_fields.label: Date
dataset_fields.help_text: A point or period of time associated with an event in the lifecycle of the resource. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

dataset_fields.label: Temporal Coverage
dataset_fields.help_text: The temporal period or periods that the dataset covers. Use ISO 8601 date format (YYYY-MM-DD).

dataset_fields.label: Rights
dataset_fields.help_text: Information about rights held in and over the resource. Typically includes a statement about various property rights associated with the resource, including intellectual property rights.

dataset_fields.label: Spatial Coverage
dataset_fields.help_text: The spatial extent or scope of the content of the resource. Spatial topic may be a named place or a location specified by its geographic coordinates.

dataset_fields.label: Type
dataset_fields.help_text: The nature or genre of the resource. Recommended to use a controlled vocabulary such as the DCMI Type Vocabulary.

dataset_fields.label: Source
dataset_fields.help_text: A related resource from which the described resource is derived. The described resource may be derived from the related resource in whole or in part.

dataset_fields.label: Relation
dataset_fields.help_text: A related resource. Recommended best practice is to identify the related resource by means of a string conforming to a formal identification system.

dataset_fields.label: Language
dataset_fields.help_text: A language of the resource. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as RFC 4646.

resource_fields.label: Name
resource_fields.form_placeholder: A descriptive title for the resource.
resource_fields.help_text: A name given to the resource.

resource_fields.label: Format
resource_fields.help_text: The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource. Examples include size and duration. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as the list of Internet Media Types [MIME].
